alert.note: Alert for Lorain; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 2:32AM EST until November 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, specifically in the far northern portions of Lorain, Summit, Portage, and Trumbull Counties. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Lorain, Summit, Portage and Trumbull counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to push south into the area this morning with snowfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour in the heaviest snow bands. Southern portions of these counties will see much lighter accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
